title: Introduction to Alchemy
description: Explore Alchemy, the developer portal that unites tools and data into one powerful platform for developers.

title: Catalog Overview
description: Navigate the catalog to view components, understand ownership, and access detailed pages on each item.

title: How to Register a Component
description: Learn how to register a new component using GitHub, ServiceNow, and Global Group in Alchemy's portal.

title: Using Alchemy Templates
description: Discover how to use Alchemy templates to quickly generate files and publish them to your repository.

title: Custom Fields and Actions
description: Add custom fields and actions (e.g., fetch:template, publish:github:pull-request) to templates.

title: Template Development
description: An introduction to Alchemy Templates. Learn how to develop templates locally and their key functions.

title: Deploying Templates
description: Push your template, test functionality, and see how changes reflect in Alchemy environments quickly.

title: Defining Template Fields
description: Discover the required fields and properties for developing an effective Alchemy template.

title: Setting Up Templates
description: Create templates and customize fields in Alchemy's editor. Explore essential template-building steps.

title: Adding TechDocs
description: Integrate TechDocs to transform Markdown into HTML for in-component documentation.
